htmlEmbed:
1/There are people who are genuinely trying to talk intelligently about cryptocurrencies, but can‚Äôt because they don‚Äôt have historical background. This thread tries to correct that by suggesting required reading. First, it‚Äôs necessary to know what problem it attempts to solve.

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

2/Bitcoin is designed to be ‚Äúsound money.‚Äù It can‚Äôt be controlled by government. What‚Äôs mine is mine, what‚Äôs yours is yours, and can‚Äôt be ‚Äúdiluted‚Äù by shadowy ‚Äúcentral bankers,‚Äù lurking in their urban apartments, smoking cigars ‚Äî or worse, eating lox bagels.

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

3/This has been an obsession of a certain kind of person for over 100 years. Protocols of the Elders of Zion (1903) was an early propaganda piece out of Russia, later amplified by Henry Ford.https://t.co/126aJH28xZ

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

4/The creation of the Federal Reserve in 1913 and the Bolshevik Revolution in 1917 terrified the industrial aristocratic class; the mob was at the gate. They were coming for their money, one way or another.https://t.co/3WDB4YNBiy

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

5/The rich did not take this lying down. They began to organize. In 1933 they tried to overthrow the US government and capture or kill FDR, to restore the Gold Standard (sound money) and kill the Federal Reserve. They were not successful.https://t.co/5XKAcUlUdG

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

6/Meanwhile another idea had taken root: race science, funded for decades by industrialist backers. Also known as ‚ÄúEugenics,‚Äù the theory was that humans could only evolve if ‚Äúsuperior‚Äù genes were propagated, requiring ‚Äúcompetition‚Äù and ‚Äúfree markets.‚Äùhttps://t.co/18ZRrf8zP7

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

7/In 1937, Wickliffe Draper started the Pioneer Fund, which for decades would support a range of ‚Äúrace science‚Äù inquiries and informed ‚Äúresearch‚Äù developing in Nazi Germany. Remember the ‚ÄúBell Curve?‚Äù That‚Äôs Pioneer Fund.https://t.co/zhrasV6uwT

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

8/A weird cult group called ‚ÄúI AM‚Äù also got underway in the 1930‚Äôs. It was obsessed with gold (‚Äúsound money‚Äù) and chanted: ‚ÄúBlast blast blast the Roosevelts from this earth.‚Äù Robert LeFevre was convicted in 1940 for his role in the gold cult.https://t.co/VgbbRJLKVp

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

9/LeFevre would go on to found the ‚ÄúFreedom School,‚Äù which laid the foundation for and promoted American libertarianism and Austrian economics. One pupil and supporter of the Freedom School? Charles Koch (see Dark Money, by Jane Mayer)https://t.co/T6E6IzP6yq

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

10/By the late 50‚Äôs, the ‚Äúsound money‚Äù goal wasn‚Äôt any closer. Candy magnate Robert Welch founded the John Birch Society to avenge ‚Äúcreeping communism‚Äù (the enemy of sound money) in the US. Eisenhower was too pinko for them.https://t.co/OQpdt258qz

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

11/A similar ‚Äúanti-communist‚Äù movement had been brewing globally, and reunited wartime fascists with emerging networks in Asia (Taiwan, South Korea, etc). The World Anti-Communist League aligned with JBS and ‚Äúsound money‚Äù policies.https://t.co/8PHiFb01qM

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

12/American libertarianism as promoted by LeFevre was heavily influenced by ‚ÄúAustrian School‚Äù economics, which posited that individual gain and competition determined all economic activity, and deduced a framework from that. (Narrator: it‚Äôs nonsense.)https://t.co/10JQA3p1jW

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

13/Still obsessed with gold, competition, and Eugenics, a new generation had entered the fray. Allying with Reagan in 1981, the Council for National Policy set out to operationalize the John Birch Society/WACL agenda. (Narrator: they did #Jan6.)https://t.co/jEgLav0yut

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

14/By 1988, ‚ÄúI AM‚Äù was long gone, but a successor, Church Universal and Triumphant, continued the pursuit. Elizabeth Clare Prophet here cites prominent libertarians Ron Paul, Murray Rothbard, and Anthony Sutton, saying gold is America‚Äôs destiny.https://t.co/dBkbYUpIBq

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

15/In 1997, two noted libertarians James Dale Davidson and William Rees-Mogg, publish ‚ÄúThe Sovereign Individual,‚Äù a screed about the demise of nation states, ‚Äúdigital cash‚Äù (gold), and disdain for taxes. Peter Thiel later wrote a foreword.https://t.co/ar7WKRJwAl

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

16/Robert Mercer, a computer scientist and linguist trained under John Bircher Revilo Oliver, believes the Eugenics trope that earnings equates to societal value. He later funds Cambridge Analytica and attempts to engineer elections.https://t.co/3mZraq1D3J

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

17/Peter Thiel goes on to manipulate American politics and also gets involved in more race science, directly connected to Pioneer Fund characters. He also backs the creation of Ethereum.https://t.co/f5LLwSgrPr

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

18/Members of the Council for National Policy tried to do on Jan 6 2021 what their forebears could not do in 1933 with the Business Plot: forcefully overthrow the US government. This is a detailed breakdown of their involvement.https://t.co/Jq6x06dCTW

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

19/Today, cryptocurrencies are attempting to drive ‚Äúsound money‚Äù by pushing FOMO around Bitcoin, which is propped up by a fraudulent project called Tether. The hope is that ‚Äúnetwork effects‚Äù (Thiel‚Äôs specialty) will kick in and drive widespread adoption.https://t.co/RiPe2fBmD4

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

20/Bitcoin and NFTs have been packaged as helping ‚Äúthe little guy‚Äù get ahead. This is called ‚Äúclass collaboration‚Äù and weaponizes working people on behalf of the ultra-rich. Mussolini did this too, under the name ‚Äúclass collaboration.‚Äùhttps://t.co/DEJA5KrgM9

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

21/And in fact, most Bitcoin is controlled by just a few people; it‚Äôs not ‚Äúdemocratized‚Äù in any way. Just 0.01% hold 27%. It‚Äôs just one more shot at the old ‚Äúsound money‚Äù fever dream, floated on the backs of average people as accomplices.https://t.co/sNViP24Itu

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

22/No discussion of crypto would be complete without mentioning its staggering waste of energy; or the real goal of displacing the dollar as the reserve currency, so as to maximize oil/gas industry returns over time. Learn about that in my audio series.https://t.co/aRs7JMQiuo

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

23/Anyone blindly promoting cryptocurrencies without understanding the full background of ‚Äúsound money,‚Äù gold, race science, and white supremacy is unwittingly advancing an agenda they don‚Äôt comprehend. Pretending it isn‚Äôt there won‚Äôt make it go away.

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

24/The background provided here is just skimming the surface. There is plenty more. It‚Äôs called ‚Äúhistory,‚Äù and it‚Äôs not had near enough attention. So we are repeating past episodes, but this time with tech bells and whistles. Please read up, get informed, and educate others.

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022

25/This is part of an effort to destabilize the world so the ‚Äúgold‚Äù network can gain primacy and ‚Äúevolve‚Äù the human race. I didn‚Äôt sign up for this agenda, nor did most people. Awareness can stop it, but it needs to be crushed with prejudice. Just like Smedley Butler did in 1934.

— Dave Troy üåª (@davetroy) January 3, 2022
